text-block.content: Spas, Beauty Salons and other Retailers are able to buy our products for sale on their premises. We have a wide range of products that are very suitable for display and sale in stores, Spas, Beauty Salons, Dermatologists, and other Retail outlets.

We offer product support and if you are interested in enhancing your available products range with high quality products that are very sellable and popular we will send one of our sales staff to you for a demonstration of what we have to offer.

Our retailer prices are very attractive and will give you ample room for your own pricing preference. We also have several deals available for you and there are promotional items and informational packages specially suited for display and on-premises sales.
For an initial contact email us at retail@igp.ph or text or call us on SMART: 0921 674 5033, Globe: 0927 255 4346
We will be more than happy to work with you and tailor a line of products for you that are well suited for your specific needs.
